tool_description: Complete Email Verification API with Threat Detection. Verify the deliverability of email addresses with our comprehensive API.

title: Email Verification with Threat Detection

api_list.name: Email Verification
api_list.description: Verify the deliverability of email addresses.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://email-verification-with-threat-detection.p.rapidapi.com/v1/email/dennis@monapi.io"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "email-verification-with-threat-detection.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://email-verification-with-threat-detection.p.rapidapi.com/v1/email/{email}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "email-verification-with-threat-detection.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
